projects.name: Breadboard
projects.description: Breadboard is a software platform for developing and conducting human interaction experiments on networks. It allows researchers to rapidly design experiments using a flexible domain-specific language and provides researchers with immediate access to a diverse pool of online participants.

projects.name: Trellis
projects.description: Trellis is a suite of software tools for developing, administering, and collecting survey and social network data. What separates Trellis from other survey tools is its support for mapping social networks and its ability to integrate them with survey data.

Maintain a NetHack variant for the event
